channel.title: 2020s on Wesley Tian
channel.description: Recent content in 2020s on Wesley Tian

item.title: I Predicted the COVID-19 Stock Market Crash of 2020
item.description: On February 15th, 2020, I predicted that COVID-19, which was wrecking havoc in China at the time would soon spread to the United States and wreak havoc here. On February 15th, 2020, I sold 85% percent of all my stocks.On February 18th, 2020, the S&P reached an all time high, despite the known ___ in China. On February 25th, 2020, the S&P crashed. Today is March 14th, 2020 and I am making a few more predictions about the future.
